description: A sailing ship navigates the water at night near a city
Escoria and Edrei lands from the shipboard. A tiger looks back him. A minotaur with a red cloac raises his fist near a thing poor man
Edrei has a scared face and shows his teeth
A hand firmly grips an arm
Escoria holds Edrei's arm. Edrei seems scared. Escoria holds a sword in her back
text: NI SE TE OCURRA SEPARARTE DE MI GUARDA EL ORO COMO TE EXPLIQUÉ EN EL BARCO Y NO HABRÁ PROBLEMAS

description: Escoria and Edrei walks among a lot of people straight to a building. The lights of a building are turned on. Edrei looks back him with a worried expression

Five people and one minutaur are standing around a table. A bald man wears a cloac with a patience look. A minotaur is arm crossed and stands against a wall. A soldier with an ornate helmet and an armor warches quietly. A sitted man has is eyes closed and writes a paper. Escoria and Edrei are turned away
Escoria smiles with a funny face
Edrei looks to his left with a questioning expression
Escoria looks happy and holds a sword in her back
text: HACÍA TIEMPO QUE NO ME HORMIGUEABA EL VIENTRE POR UNA BATALLA. PARECE QUE AQUÍ TENDREMOS ALGÚN DIGNO RIVAL...

description: Edrei and Escoria are standing near a desktop with an ornate armored guard holding a spear and a man with a long blacj beard and sharped ears writes a paper
A hand slices a letter in a desktop who has a man writting on it
A man with a long black beard and sharped ears reads a letter
Edrei peeks out from behind Escoria with a confused expression. Escoria smiles
A man with a long black beard and sharped ears gives two papers to the front with eyes closed
text: ENTRAD POR LA PUERTA OESTE, ALLÍ OS DARÁN LA ORDEN DE ENTRAR A LA ARENA CUANDO OS TOQUE

description: A hand holds two papers
Edrei and Escoria walks throw a dark entrance. Edrei looks cautious
Two people descend a staircase into a room with a bench in front of a window
Escoria holds her sword with a tranquil face. Edrei looks back. A minotaur is sitting a bench near a window. A red dressed woman with glasses walks holding papers
Edrei and Escoria looks back theirselves. A woman with glasses holds a scroll with a happy expression
column4: VENGO A INFORMAROS LAS NORMAS ¿PUEDO VER SUS TARJETAS?"

description: A hand holds a card. A woman with glasses fits her glasses to the face and holds scroll. A woman with glasses pull up a finger and holds a scroll
column5: SI NO TENÉIS SE OS PROPORCIONARÁ UNO QUE DEBERÁ SER DEVUELTO AL FINALIZAR. POR ÚLTIMO
column6: LOS HECHIZOS DEMASIADO PELIGROSOS ESTÁN RESTRINGIDOS

description: Edrei and Escoria are sitted down. Edrei has an ill face and the eyes closed. Escoria smiles and holds a sword in her shoulder
text: "TRAS VARIOS MINUTOS... AY NOOO... ¡¡ESCORIA Y EDREI!!"

description: Escoria and Edrei are walking throw a shiny door. Escoria holds a sword with her right arm and shoulder. Edrei look at his right and cry
